001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.AdditionalArgumentsOption;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Composer;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.DefaultCommand;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JLinkCommand;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JPackageCommand;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JUnitCommand;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JarCommand;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavacCommand;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.JavadocCommand;
012import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.Option;
013import java.util.Collection;
014import java.util.List;
015
016/**
017 * An aggregator of command-line arguments.
018 *
019 * @param <T> the implementing type
020 */
021public interface Command<T extends Command<T>> {
022
023  /** {@return the name of the command} */
024  String name();
025
026  default T composing(Composer<T> composer) {
027    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
028    T self = (T) this;
029    return composer.apply(self);
030  }
031
032  /** {@return the option object holding zero or more additional arguments} */
033  AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals();
034
035  /**
036   * Creates a new instance of the implementing class with the given option object.
037   *
038   * @param additionals the option object to use
039   * @return a new instance of the implementing class
040   * @see #option(Option)
041   */
042  T additionals(AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals);
043
044  static DefaultCommand of(String name, Object... arguments) {
045    return new DefaultCommand(name).addAll(arguments);
046  }
047
048  static JarCommand jar() {
049    return new JarCommand();
050  }
051
052  static JavacCommand javac() {
053    return new JavacCommand();
054  }
055
056  static JavadocCommand javadoc() {
057    return new JavadocCommand();
058  }
059
060  static JLinkCommand jlink() {
061    return new JLinkCommand();
062  }
063
064  static JPackageCommand jpackage() {
065    return new JPackageCommand();
066  }
067
068  static JUnitCommand junit() {
069    return new JUnitCommand();
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Creates a new instance of the implementing class with the given option object.
074   *
075   * @param option the option object to use
076   * @return a new instance of the implementing class
077   */
078  default T option(Option option) {
079    if (option instanceof AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals) return additionals(additionals);
080    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Option class " + option.getClass());
081  }
082
083  default T add(Object argument) {
084    return additionals(additionals().add(argument));
085  }
086
087  default T add(String option, Object value, Object... more) {
088    return additionals(additionals().add(option, value, more));
089  }
090
091  default T addAll(Object... arguments) {
092    return additionals(additionals().addAll(arguments));
093  }
094
095  default T addAll(Collection<?> arguments) {
096    return additionals(additionals().addAll(arguments));
097  }
098
099  /** {@return a list of all aggregated arguments} */
100  default List<String> toArguments() {
101    return List.copyOf(additionals().values());
102  }
103}
